snippet: A United Nations legal institution will report Turkey to the Security Council for failing to release an international judge who is among thousands of people detained in the aftermath of last year's failed coup, according to a ruling issued Monday....

headline.main: Harry Potter Play Gets 11 Olivier Awards Nominations
headline.print_headline: Harry Potter Play Gets 11 Olivier Awards Nominations

lead_paragraph: A United Nations legal institution will report Turkey to the Security Council for failing to release an international judge who is among thousands of people detained in the aftermath of last year's failed coup, according to a ruling issued Monday.
